CustomField.description: Users must populate this field upon reactivation from 'Deferred' status. This date will then create Invoices starting on an unreconciled Statement with the same start date as this field.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Users must populate this field upon reactivation from 'Deferred' status. This date will then create Invoices starting on an unreconciled Statement with the same start date as this field.
CustomField.label: Reactivation Date
